title: Long I Fell (4C97)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Spell. Skirmish: Spot Gandalf to prevent all wounds to him. Any Shadow player may make you wound a minion to prevent this.
Lore:	”'His fire was about me. I was burned.'”
Rarity:	C
